comment: Great. Its imperative that learns frm and co-ordinates with countries with better system/methods of combating terrorism
amr:
# ::snt Great. Its imperative that learns frm and co-ordinates with countries with better system/methods of combating terrorism
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (g / great
            :domain (ii / it))
      :snt2 imperative
      :domain (a / and
            :op1 (l / learn-01
                  :ARG1 (t / thing
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "frM")))
            :op2 (c / coordinate-01
                  :ARG1 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (c2 / country
                              :ARG0-of (h / have-03
                                    :ARG1 (s / slash
                                          :op1 (s2 / system)
                                          :op2 (m2 / method)
                                          :ARG1-of (h2 / have-degree-91
                                                :ARG2 (g2 / good-02
                                                      :ARG1 s)
                                                :ARG3 (m3 / more)))
                                    :instrument-of (c3 / combat-01
                                          :ARG1 (t2 / terrorism))))
                        :op2 c2))))

                                    :op2 "Zealand")))))
      :op2 (s / safe-01
            :ARG1 h)
      :time (a2 / after
            :op1 (a3 / assault-01
                  :ARG0 (p / police)
                  :ARG1 g)))
